versos: (uri) 2 Samuel 13:34 - But Absalom fled. And went to Talmai the son of Ammihud

(shame) Psalm 25:3 - Indeed, none of those who wait for You will be ashamed; Those who deal treacherously without cause will be ashamed.;;;
